data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Booking hold expiration prevents slot locking". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

requestBody.title: Create and publish offer version Snapshot

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Reverse-Bid Internal Shift Market. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Queue ETA signal support to create temporary unavailability windows". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Cancellation with access until period end". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
